title: Baby's First Christmas
description: ALL I WANT FOR CHRISTMAS...Okay, so Mommy didn't get pregnant the conventional way. After all, she's a woman of the nineties—and, unfortunately, all work and no play. And even though a sperm bank might seem like a cold, artificial way to have a baby, Mommy's heart is warm and loving....IS A DADDYThen Sullivan Travis entered our lives. He wants custody of me—and I think he wants Mommy, too. Boy, it's all so confusing. Could Uncle Sullivan also be my daddy? I guess I'll find out around Christmastime, because that's when I'm due to arrive...THE BABY OF THE MONTH CLUB: For five moms-to-be, finding the perfect daddy is just a due date away!
author: Marie Ferrarella
